CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( Order_Released_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 2, Order_Released_Date__c + 2 + 5, 3, Order_Released_Date__c + 2 + 5, 4, Order_Released_Date__c + 2 + 5, 5, Order_Released_Date__c + 2 + 5, 6, Order_Released_Date__c + 2 + 5, Order_Released_Date__c + 2 + 5 )
CustomField.label: Expected Delivery Date
